name: The Trace
description:
This is a thrilling game with a thrilling experience, for Vive and Oculus, through the immersive play and VR live video, tells a story about detective, suspense and conspiracy.
Players need to find clues in the disturbing interior environment, find links between unusual or unusual items, solve the puzzle, to complete the investigation of the detective.
At the same time, beware of those indescribable dangers ...
